previous.excerpt:
Since the first manned spaceflight, mission patches were sewn to astronauts
suits to represent their mission goals. Every single spaceflight has had their
own custom-made, crew-designed mission patch to be worn in space and I see no
reason why our mission aboard the GME should be any different. So,â€¦

Dear Autists,



BB is looking good for a couple reasons.

 1. Rumor of settled lawsuits with FB in BB's favor. Should have details within
    two weeks.
 2. BB just sold phone patents to Huwawei. This frees them from their smartphone
    burdens and gives more capital for their EBIT.
 3. BB's CEOâ€¦
